title: High school shouldnt be mandatory.
body:
Unless you are trying to compete for the free ride scholorships, its literally useless and overhyped. Big waste of time, just dropout, get GED, and go to a real school like PTECH or something that actually teaches you a trade for a job, not useless general information. 

Dropoutage should be 14 without parent consent. I skipped all of high school and they threatened to arrest my mom. How the fuck is that her fault?

/rant.
